typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesCSV
moviesCSV derive(movies = @(movieid=movie,
		title=title,
		genres=split(genres,'|'),
		year=year,
		rating=Rating)) ~> MakeHierarchy
MakeHierarchy sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/movies/title'],
	throughput: 2000,
	mapColumn(
		id = movie,
		movies
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> makeJSON
